mapper.select:
select a.id, a.LOGIN_CODE staff_code, c.ORG_DEPT_ID org_id, d.ORG_FULLNAME org_name, c.post_id, c.post_org_id, case when po.post_name is null then e.POST_NAME else po.post_name end post_name, e.POST_LEVEL post_level, po.JOB_LEVEL_ID job_level_id, b.STAFF_SCOPE staff_scope, b.job_type, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.ENTRY_TIME) entry_time, b.sex, datediff(now(),b.BIRTHDAY)/365 age, b.BIRTHPLACE birthplace from mp_user a left join mp_staff b on a.id=b.user_id left join mp_userpost c on a.id=c.USER_ID and c.MAIN_POST=1 left join mp_organization d on c.ORG_DEPT_ID=d.id left join mp_post e on c.POST_ID=e.id left join mp_post_org po on c.post_org_id=po.id
AND a.id=#{id}
